byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and SUSANNE CRAIG

lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo outlined budget cuts and spending initiatives for city programs that nearly guaranteed to extend the feud between him and Mayor Bill de Blasio.

headline.print_headline: Governor Gives Mayor Tough News on Budget and Homelessness
headline.main: For de Blasio, Cuomo’s State of the State Address Holds More Tough News

snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo outlined budget cuts and spending initiatives for city programs that nearly guaranteed to extend the feud between him and Mayor Bill de Blasio.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo's State of State address contains bad news for New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, who must account for hundreds of millions of dollars in funding that Cuomo says state will no longer provide, week before de Blasio must present city's budget.
